title: Raymundo’s MAJOR wedding news + Eric Church On A Song Coming To Him In A Dream + Lunchbox Calls To Try and Buy One Chicken Wing
itunes:title: Raymundo’s MAJOR wedding news + Eric Church On A Song Coming To Him In A Dream + Lunchbox Calls To Try and Buy One Chicken Wing
description:
Raymundo brings in a major wedding update regarding a concern people are having about it still happening in October. We talk to Eric Church about writing 28 songs in 28 days including one that came to him in a dream. Lunchbox called a wing place to see if he could just buy one single wing.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
